messages.title: A Fair Deal For Rural Britain
messages.content: Candidate Danny Gallagher believes that our rural communities and the real economy have suffered under Conservatives and Labour governments.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Fairer Taxes for You and Your Family
keyPolicies.policyDescription: No one will pay any income tax on the first £10,000 they earn - saving an average family £700 a year.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: A Fair Start for Every Child
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Smaller class sizes, more cash for schools and scrapping tuition fees.
Promote manufacturing and green technology, break up the banks and provide real help for local small and medium businesses.
Give you the right to sack your MP, end party donations, clean up and make transparent parliamentary party lists.

issues.economy: Promote manufacturing and green technology, break up the banks and provide real help for local small and medium businesses.
issues.education: Smaller class sizes, more cash for schools and scrapping tuition fees.
issues.governance: Give you the right to sack your MP, end party donations, clean up and make transparent parliamentary party lists.

housing.content: Housing is also a important issue where house prices are far beyond average wages for Preston meaning many young people are unable to buy their first homes.

leaflet.personalStatement: Candidate Danny Gallagher believes that our rural communities and the real economy have suffered under Conservatives and Labour governments.

images.caption: Danny Gallagher with fellow Liberal Democrat supporters
